message:
Hi Hunter Sprague,

Pico 1:
lora = RYLR896(1) # Sets the UART port to be use
sleep_ms(100)
lora.set_addr(1)  # Sets the LoRa address

Pico 2:
lora = RYLR896(1) # Sets the UART port to be use
sleep_ms(100)
lora.set_addr(2)  # Sets the LoRa address
message_html:
Hi Hunter Sprague,

Pico 1:
lora = RYLR896(1) # Sets the UART port to be use
sleep_ms(100)
lora.set_addr(1) # Sets the LoRa address

Pico 2:

sleep_ms(100)
lora.set_addr(2) # Sets the LoRa address
